title: Wisconsin State Hall of Fame Inductees
author: GFCBA Staff
excerpt: Congrats to our association's own Pam Haertl, Rob Schuh, and Melissa Lang for their well-deserved induction into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame!
content: We are thrilled to announce that three bowlers from our association have been inducted into the Wisconsin State Bowling Hall of Fame. Pam Haertl (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 1992), Rob Schuh (GFCUSBC Hall-of-Fame Class of 2015), and Melissa Lang have all achieved this remarkable honor. Their dedication to the sport and outstanding accomplishments have earned them a place among Wisconsin's bowling elite. Read more about their accomplishments at the Wisconsin State USBC website.
